DeferralValueCustom.title: Maximum Deferral (non-critical)
DeferralValueCustom.description: The maximum deferral for non-critical updates

DeferralValueCustomCritical.title: Maximum Deferral (critical)
DeferralValueCustomCritical.description: The maximum deferral for critical updates

scriptLog.title: scriptLog
scriptLog.description: Where should the script logs be wrote and saved

macOSupdateSelection.title: macOS update selection
macOSupdateSelection.description: Select which type of macOS update should be applied.

enum_titles: Latest version based on device eligibility

macOSspecificVersion.title: Specific macOS version
macOSspecificVersion.description: Enter the desired version number here (only relevant if ‘Specific version’ has been selected).

dontRunUpdatesOnDays.title: Don't run updates on days
dontRunUpdatesOnDays.description: Select the days of the week on which updates should NOT be carried out. If it is calculated that the update should start on the day on which it may not be executed, the next possible day is defined.

runUpdatesOnTime.title: Run updates on time
runUpdatesOnTime.description: Enter the time (hour and minute) at which the update is to be carried out. If no time is defined, the update is started at the time at which the plan was created. A specific time can therefore be defined, e.g. 13:00. Please note that the 24-hour system is used here.

Dialog_Settings.description: The Swift dialog window can be adjusted in height, width, heading size and font size. If no values are set via the plist, the values from the script are used.

BannerImage.title: BannerImage
BannerImage.description: Path to banner, if you want the window to be displayed with a banner.

Dialog_update_height.title: Dialog_update_height
Dialog_update_height.description: Height of the window, if not specified, the default value in the script is used.

Dialog_update_titlefont.title: Dialog_update_titlefont
Dialog_update_titlefont.description: Font size for the titel. If not specified, the default value in the script is used.

Dialog_update_messagefont.title: Dialog_update_messagefont
Dialog_update_messagefont.description: Font size for the text. If not specified, the default value in the script is used.

Buttontimer.description: So that the user takes the time to read the message and does not accidentally click the buttons, they are deactivated for a certain time and only reactivated after expiry. This time can be adjusted here for the various windows. Specified in seconds. If no values are set via the profile, the default values are used in the Script.

buttontimer_Final_Message.title: Timer für Buttons Final Message
buttontimer_Final_Message.description: How long does it take until the buttons in the 'Final User Info' are activated and the user can click on them so that the user has enough time to read the message. Specified in seconds.

Messanges.description: Definition of the messages for the standard message, error message, etc. Please specify the complete messages in the respective language carefully. The following variables can be used: %REAL_NAME% | %CURRENT_DEFERRAL_VALUE% | %forceInstallLocalDateTime% These are replaced in the script with the respective variables in the script

MaxMessageTime.title: Timeout Meldung
MaxMessageTime.description: How long the message is displayed to users before it is automatically closed. Specified in seconds.

StandardUpdatePrompt.title: Update: Standard message
StandardUpdatePrompt.description: The message with which the user is informed about the available updates.
